song_name: Hudson's Adventure Island III NES - Coastal Clash
metrics_conclusion: In terms of chords and melody, Hudson's Adventure Island III NES - Coastal Clash has complexity on par with the typical song, having near-average scores in Melodic Complexity, Chord-Melody Tension and Chord Progression Novelty and below-average scores in Chord Complexity and Chord-Bass Melody.
key_conclusion: Hudson's Adventure Island III NES - Coastal Clash has sections analyzed in the following keys: G Major,  and D Mixolydian.  Click on the linked cheat sheets for popular chords, chord progressions, downloadable midi files and more!
